title: MetaShot Application to Environmental Samples
body:
@bfosso As described in the Readme file, the tool package is designed for Human gut microbiome, I was wondering whether you have tested the pipeline with environmental samples? I would assume this is applicable, but need to use a more comprehensive reference database. Could you please give me some instruction in more detail?
Thank you.

title: can this software be used for other shotgun data ?
body:
Hi, 
This software seems amazing. May I know can this software be used for the shotgun data besides the human-specific source? 
Thanks

title: PhiX sequences
body: The Phix_cleaner.py script appears to require a phix bowtie2 index but it is not clear from the README exactly how that should be formatted or where that should be located.

title: DIrect link to reference collections?
body:
Hello,

For the reference collections download, there doesn't seem to be a direct file path, which means it can't be downloaded using wget.  The "direct link" is just https://recascloud.ba.infn.it/index.php/s/9dFFTJUr0bOU2mN/download, which isn't the file itself.

Is there a direct path?

title: files not found
body:
--Hi,

some files and folders below are missing from compressed folder “MetaShot_reference_data.tar.gz”:
 'visualization_virus.dmp',
 'VIRUS_DMP', 
'Bacteria/tango_dmp_folder', 
'Fungi/tango_dmp_folder/' , 
Protist/tango_dmp_folder

can you check that please ?

Thak you --

title: MetaShot not multi-threaded
body: MetaShot_Master_script.py doesn't accept -t parameter to set number of threads to use !

title: Hi tango question
body:
Hi 
Currently, I'm trying to go over your program. 
I got stuck running MetaShot.


(metashot) sjlee@mine:/data/sjlee/labwork/MetaShot/MetaShot:> python MetaShot_Master_script.py -m simulated_list.txt -p parameters_file.txt 
['/data/sjlee/labwork/MetaShot/simulated/simulated_metagenome_1.fastq', '/data/sjlee/labwork/MetaShot/simulated/simulated_metagenome_2.fastq']
/data/sjlee/labwork/MetaShot/MetaShot/
/data/sjlee/labwork/MetaShot/MetaShot_reference_data/
/data/sjlee/labwork/MetaShot/MetaShot_reference_data/Bacteria/bacterial_bowtie_index_reference.lst
Cleaning data
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "MetaShot_Master_script.py", line 292, in <module>
    p = subprocess.Popen(cmd, stdout=std_out_file, stderr=std_out_file)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 394, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 1047, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory


I'm assuming it is because there are no tango related files (folders)
'Virus/tango_dmp_folder/'
'Bacteria/tango_dmp_folder/',
'Fungi/tango_dmp_folder/' ,
'Protist/tango_dmp_folder/'

Am I supposed to run tango.pl in 'New_TANGO_perl_version' folder? 
If it is, can give some command lines for guidance or perhaps the preprocessed files you used?

Thanks a lot.
